opendial.bn.distribs.utility

Interface UtilityDistribution

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RuleUtilDistribution, UtilityTable

    public interface UtilityDistribution
    Generic interface for an utility distribution (also called value distribution), mapping every assignment X1, ..., Xn to a scalar utility U(X1, ...., Xn).

    Typically, at least one of these X1, ..., Xn variables consist of a decision variable.

    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-01-21 00:18:30 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UtilityDistribution copy()
      Creates a copy of the utility distribution
      double getUtil(Assignment input)
      Returns the utility associated with the specific assignment of values for the input nodes.
      boolean isWellFormed()
      Checks that the utility distribution is well-formed (all assignments are covered)
      void modifyVarId(java.lang.String oldId, java.lang.String newId)
      Changes the variable label

    • Method Detail

      • getUtil

        double getUtil(Assignment input)
        Returns the utility associated with the specific assignment of values for the input nodes. If none exists, returns 0.0f.
        Parameters:
        input - the value assignment for the input chance nodes
        Returns:
        the associated utility

      • isWellFormed

        boolean isWellFormed()
        Checks that the utility distribution is well-formed (all assignments are covered)
        Returns:
        true is the distribution is well-formed, false otherwise

      • copy

        UtilityDistribution copy()
        Creates a copy of the utility distribution
        Returns:
        the copy

      • modifyVarId

        void modifyVarId(java.lang.String oldId,
               java.lang.String newId)
        Changes the variable label
        Parameters:
        oldId - the old variable label
        newId - the new variable label
